org.apache.fop.afp.modca.triplets

Class AttributeValueTriplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.afp.modca.AbstractAFPObject
      • org.apache.fop.afp.modca.triplets.AbstractTriplet
        • org.apache.fop.afp.modca.triplets.AttributeValueTriplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Triplet, Streamable, StructuredData

    public class AttributeValueTriplet
extends AbstractTriplet
    The attribute value triplet is used to specify a value for a document attribute.
